eng: We worship the Father of Light, and His only-begotten Son, and the Spirit, the Paraclete; the Trinity, one in essence.
cop: Ten`ouwst `m`Viwt `nte piouwini@ nem PefSyri `mmonogenyc@ nem pi`Pneuma `mParaklyton@ ]`Triac `nomooucioc.
ara: نسجد لآب النور، وإبنه الوحيد، والروح المعزي، الثالوث المساوي
